0110001111011001 0110011101000101 0 -> sum: 1100101100011110, cout: 0

1101010000110011 0011100001101110 0 -> sum: 0000110010100001, cout: 1
0101000111110001 1100101011010010 1 -> sum: 0001110011000100, cout: 1
1111000011010010 1010000000111010 0 -> sum: 1001000100001100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
